  • Method Details

    • insertMarbleInRow

      public java.util.List<Marble> insertMarbleInRow​(int rowIndex)
      This method performs the action of inserting the MarbleLeft in the MarbleMatrix in order to give the player the list of Marbles which he will later insert into his depots
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - index of the row of the MarbleMatrix in which player wants to insert the MarbleLeft
      Returns:
      a list of Marbles that will be converted and added into the depots of the Player who performed this action

    • insertMarbleInCol

      public java.util.List<Marble> insertMarbleInCol​(int colIndex)
      This method performs the action of inserting the MarbleLeft in the MarbleMatrix in order to give the player the list of Marbles which he will later insert into his depots
      Parameters:
      colIndex - index of the column of the MarbleMatrix in which player wants to insert the MarbleLeft
      Returns:
      a list of Marbles that will be converted and added into the depots of the Player who performed this action
